tha-ap103:1.4: Vanā nibbanamāgataṃ → vānā nibbānamāgataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap103:3.1: Padenānupadāyantaṃ → padenānupadaṃ santaṃ (bj); padenānupadāyanto (si, sya1ed, sya2ed); padenānupadaṃyanto (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap103:3.4: buddhe ādiccabandhune → … bandhuni (bj); buddhassādiccabandhuno (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
